v_title: What is Virtual DOM || React Interview Questions || Understanding DOM
v_description:
Welcome to ReactJS Interview Questions Series, here I am going to explain the most asked React Interview Questions in detail.

What is Virtual DOM? This is the first video of this series and today we're looking at the Browser Components, Render Engine, why DOM is failing, and then finally why do we exactly need a Virtual DOM.
Read the transcript on Medium: 
https://shuvamk.medium.com/why-exactl...

I hope you like the video, please do comment and subscribe if you haven't :)
